short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Harry 796 virus. Click anywhere and you will see why it is so annoying!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a virus that is really annoying. It's perfect for when you have someone that you are annoyed with and want to get revenge on them. Have fun!
